scripts.test: npm run build && cd build && ctest --output-on-failure
scripts.dist: rm -rf ./dist && mkdir -p ./dist/src && mkdir -p ./dist/include/storylet_framework && cp ./src/*.cpp ./dist/src && cp ./include/storylet_framework/*.h ./dist/include/storylet_framework && cp ../README.md ./dist
scripts.pack: npm run dist && mkdir -p ../dist/v$npm_package_version && rm -rf ../dist/v$npm_package_version/$npm_package_name-v$npm_package_version.zip && zip -r ../dist/v$npm_package_version/$npm_package_name-v$npm_package_version.zip ./dist
